title: Signing Up For Alpha And Not Gettting In
body: I had signed up for the alpha when it was first available, since then it has been pending. All my friends have gotten the client and here I am sitting without it and missing out. I also cannot contact riot as when i submit a ticket there is no language option, when i try submit it, it says to fill in the language section even though there is no option in the language section. My summoner name is TheProGuy10. Please help me soon or I will miss out on the alpha client.         {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It's almost over anyway, new client should be in open beta soon anyway.

The Alpha client is getting polished and a lot more stable. When the Alpha ends, the client will be in the open beta stage. From the [DevBlog](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/a89677b2-53a0-498c-a16d-a926d1788d14):

> Up until this point, the alpha has been limited to players who manually applied using our alpha sign-up process. When the alpha ends, that will change. The open beta will be for everybody—the download will appear in the legacy client's launcher as a pop up. You can make the switch right then and there, fully replacing your existing client with the updated one.

https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/LCU/2016/october/alpha_ending_soon/beta-opt-in-screenshot-en_US.png
